non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed, Right of access, Right to rectification, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to restriction of processing, Right to data portability, Right to object, Rights in relation to automated decision making and profiling.
non_compliant.amend: The privacy policy should clearly and concisely provide information about the data processing activities, including the identity and contact details of the controller, the purpose of processing, the legal basis, the recipients of the data, the data retention period, and the data subject's rights. It should also provide information about the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.
